page.title: 01SUMMARY OF AREA.
page.content: Ilfracombe is a town of 10,000 people many of whom are elderly.The area is very attractive with much farmland, cliff and sea.The town grew in late Victorian times because it was a seaside resort.Today it still attracts many visitors and a lot of local jobs are connected with tourism.In the summer the population rises to 25,000 and the town becomes very busy.In the winter there is much wind and rain and if it snows the town can easily become cut off.Unemployment rises in the winter to 25% and everywhere is very quiet.There is not much flat land in this area and a lot of the streets are quite steep.There are a lot of churches in this area as well as pubs.A recent local issue concerns the fouling of pavements by dogs.Also local people are worried about public transport.
